sources.title: ePlus Inc. v. Lawson Software Inc. - Analysis Group
sources.snippet: A judge in the US District Court for the Eastern District of Virginia awarded ePlus Inc. damages of more than $17 million after finding that Lawson Software Inc. violated a May 23, 2011 permanent injunction order. The order prohibited Lawson from licensing or servicing procurement software products that infringed an ePlus patent.
